positive_text: We had an unforgettable stay at Riad Maya. The restaurant, run by the ownerâ€™s mother, offers authentic and delicious Moroccan cuisine. The spa is a true moment of relaxation, and the riadâ€™s location is perfect for exploring Fes on foot. place name:

review title: A True Hidden Gem in the Heart of Fes â€“ Unforgettable Experience at Riad Maya
positive_text:
Staying at Riad Maya was nothing short of magical. From the moment we stepped through the doors, we were enveloped in an atmosphere of peace, beauty, and warm Moroccan hospitality. The Riad itself is stunning â€” a harmonious blend of traditional design and elegant comfort, with every detail thoughtfully curated.

But what truly sets this place apart is the owner. He is, without exaggeration, one of the kindest and most genuine hosts we've ever encountered. His passion for sharing Moroccan culture, his attention to every guestâ€™s needs, and his deep knowledge of Fes transformed our stay into a truly personal and enriching experience. He went above and beyond to make us feel at home â€” arranging tours, offering helpful advice, and always greeting us with a warm smile and sincere care.

The breakfast was divine, the rooms immaculate, and the ambiance unforgettable. Whether you're visiting Fes for the first time or returning again, Riad Maya is the kind of place you will never forget â€” because of its beauty, but most of all, because of the people behind it.

Thank you for an extraordinary stay. We can't wait to return.

place name:
Amayour Desert Camp
Une nouvelle fenÃªtre va s'ouvrir
positive_text:
My experience in this camp felt more like an inner journey than just a touristic trip. During the day, we lived thrilling adventures driving over golden sands, and at night, we found serenity under the dome of the sky. What touched me the most was our visit to the nomadic Bedouins. These people live with the bare minimum, yet their hearts overflow with generosity. We sat with them, drinking tea, as if we were part of their family.
Visiting Rissani added a different flavorâ€”itâ€™s not just a city, but an open-air museum reflecting the spirit of ancient trade and the desert. As for the Khamlia, it was a spiritual surprise: the African Gnawa music, with its deep rhythms and enchanting melodies, made me dance unconsciously. I returned to the camp filled with a spiritual energy I had never experienced before.

place name:
Amayour Desert Camp
Une nouvelle fenÃªtre va s'ouvrir
positive_text: Everything in this place reflects the people's love for the desert. From the warm welcome, to the home-cooked food, to the cozy tent. What impressed me the most is how they combine modern comfort with the authenticity of living in the heart of the sands. I felt like I was in a dream, and I didn't want it to end

place name:
Amayour Desert Camp
Une nouvelle fenÃªtre va s'ouvrir
positive_text: A visit to this camp in Merzouga felt like a dream come true. The journey to the camp itself was an exciting adventure, but the real surprise came upon arrival: the warm welcome, the mint tea, and the genuine smiles. At night, we sat with guests from different nationalities around the fire, listening to music and watching the clear sky. I have never felt so close to nature and so at peace within. It is a place that every lover of travel and tranquility should visit.

place name:

positive_text: What makes this camp different from others is the sense of personal attention. Every guest is treated with special care, and this is reflected in the hospitality and the way they are treated. We spent three wonderful days: adventurous days and peaceful nights under the stars. The tent was spacious and more comfortable than expected. I loved that the camp pays attention to environmental details, preserving the cleanliness and beauty of the desert. I can truly say that I found a little piece of paradise here.

positive_text: I was hesitant before visiting the desert, but this experience completely changed my perspective. The place is safe, clean, and equipped with everything you need. I really enjoyed the activities organized by the camp, like sandboarding and watching the sunset from the top of the dunes. I feel like I left this place with memories that will stay with me for a lifetime.

Breakfast amid the golden sands was a special experience, and activities like camel riding and sandboarding made me feel a childlike joy. Une nouvelle fenÃªtre va s'ouvrir
positive_text: We loved everything about our stay in this camp - it was magical and unforgetable. It truly was the highlight of our trip to Morocco. The camp is luxurious, decorated with great attention to detail. It is literally located within the desert - you can just climb the dunes to have a magnificent view and to watch the sunset. The dinner was delicious. After dinner, the team played some local music and we were dancing around the campfire which was a lot of fun. But the focus of the evening was on stargazing. We had perfect weather conditions and could see a lot of stars and even the milky way. It was spectacular!

positive_text:
Our overnight stay in the desert was truly amazing. When we arrived in Merzouga, the camel ride was waiting for us by the sand dunes. The camel guide was very friendly and knowledgeable about his culture. The camp where we stayed was very clean and safe. Dinner was absolutely delicious, and breakfast the next morning was equally delightful. Overall, it was an unforgettable experience. We highly recommended two night in Merzouga for best Desert experience.

Thank you guys for your hospitality.

review title: An Amazing Stay at Aisha VIP Camp â€“ Truly Special!
positive_text:
My stay at Aisha VIP Camp in Merzouga was nothing short of amazing. I wasnâ€™t sure what to expect spending a night in the Sahara, but this experience completely exceeded all my expectations.

The camp itself is beautifulâ€”luxurious tents with everything you need, including comfortable beds, clean private bathrooms, and traditional decor that gives a real Berber vibe while still feeling upscale and cozy.

The team at the camp was absolutely wonderfulâ€”super welcoming, kind, and always ready to help. They made the whole experience feel personal and authentic. You can really tell they care about making guests feel at home.

The camel ride through the dunes at sunset was breathtaking, and later in the evening we enjoyed a delicious traditional Moroccan dinner followed by live Berber music under the stars. It was such a peaceful and joyful nightâ€”definitely one of the highlights of my trip to Morocco.

Waking up to the sunrise over the dunes and enjoying breakfast with a view was the perfect way to end the stay.

If youâ€™re thinking about visiting the Sahara, I highly recommend staying at Aisha VIP Camp. Itâ€™s comfortable, authentic, and full of little touches that make the whole experience unforgettable. I only stayed one night, but itâ€™s a memory that will last forever.

positive_text:
Ik ben zeer tevreden over mijn verblijf hier. De gastheer was ontzettend vriendelijk en altijd bereikbaar â€“ 24/7 stond hij voor me klaar. Alles wat ik nodig had, werd direct geregeld. Ik verbleef hier 9 dagen en heb echt genoten van de rust: â€™s avonds kun je zonder overlast heerlijk slapen.

De locatie is goed bereikbaar, en parkeren is veilig op 5 minuten lopen. Dankzij de gastheer was er altijd een parkeerplek voor me beschikbaar en kon ik zonder problemen in- en uitrijden.

Tijdens mijn verblijf werd ik zelfs aangereden vlak voor het appartement. De gastheer stond direct voor me klaar, hielp me en bleef me bijstaan â€“ dat waardeer ik enorm.

Het appartement zelf is schoon en van alle gemakken voorzien. Voor een zorgeloze vakantie kan ik deze plek van harte aanbevelen!

Wat ook erg fijn is: de gastheer spreekt zowel Nederlands als Engels. Dat maakt het communiceren voor iedereen makkelijk en prettig.
negative_text: Er is werkelijk niets om over te klagen â€“ alles was boven verwachting. Niets is tegengevallen en eerlijk gezegd ben ik nog nooit zÃ³ blij geweest met een accommodatie. Ik heb zelf mijn eigen huis, maar toch voel ik me hier zelfs nog fijner, juist door de rust, de service en de locatie die perfect is voor mij en mijn gezin. Ik ben een zeer tevreden klant en kom hier met plezier terug.

place name:
Cozy & Luxurious holiday stay in Saidia!
Une nouvelle fenÃªtre va s'ouvrir
review title: Very pleasant stay with a great host!
positive_text:
Our stay at the cozy apartment was absolutely wonderful, thanks to the attentive and gracious host. From the moment we messaged the host to inquire about our concerns before booking, we felt welcomed.

The apartment itself was clean which provided us a peaceful place for several days. Location is not too far from the beach. There's a restaurant nearby and a small store within the vicinity. Kinda hard to get taxi (I saw very few taxis in the area during our 2 week stay). Parking space is not an issue. Neighborhood is still being built/developed. Quiet apartment. Activities like horseriding and quads are available nearby.

Our host went above and beyond to ensure our comfort especially that he's very responsive. We truly appreciated the warm hospitality and would highly recommend this apartment to anyone seeking homey home-away-from-home experience in Saidia. We look forward to returning on our next visit!
